data.eml:eml: Three new species of Phyllodesmium Ehrenberg (Gastropoda: Nudibranchia: Aeolidoidea), and a revised phylogenetic analysis

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Moore, Elizabeth, Gosliner, Terrence (2009): Three new species of Phyllodesmium Ehrenberg (Gastropoda: Nudibranchia: Aeolidoidea), and a revised phylogenetic analysis. Zootaxa 2201: 30-48, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.189627
